org.ireas.mediawiki

Interface MediaWiki

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMediaWiki

    public interface MediaWiki
extends Closeable
    Interface to the API of a MediaWiki installation. This class accesses the api.php file of a MediaWiki installation and parses the result in the JSON format. Instead of directly performing requests using the performRequest or performJsonRequest methods, use the predefined methods. To receive an instance of this class, use the MediaWikiFactory.

    The following requests are supported at the moment:

    API requestMethod
    action=query&list=usercontribs (counts) getContribCount
    action=query&list=usercontribs (first edit) getFirstEdit
    action=query&list=users (single user) getUserData
    See Also:
    MediaWikiFactory

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      URI getApiUri()
      Returns the URI of the api.php file used by this MediaWiki instance.
      int getContribCount(String user, int limit)
      Returns the contribution count for the specified user using the specified limit.
      int getContribCount(String user, int limit, Set<Namespace> namespaces)
      Returns the contribution count for the specified user in the specified namespaces using the specified limit.
      int getContribCount(String user, int limit, Set<Namespace> namespaces, DateTime endDate)
      Returns the contribution count for the specified user in the specified namespaces until the specified end date using the specified limit.
      int getContribCount(String user, int limit, Set<Namespace> namespaces, DateTime endDate, Period period)
      Returns the contribution count for the specified user in the specified namespaces until the specified end date within the specified period using the specified limit.

    • Method Detail

      • getApiUri

        URI getApiUri()
        Returns the URI of the api.php file used by this MediaWiki instance.
        Returns:
        the API URI

      • getContribCount

        int getContribCount(String user,
                  int limit)
                    throws MediaWikiException
        Returns the contribution count for the specified user using the specified limit. If the user does not exist, zero is returned.
        Parameters:
        user - the name of the user to get the contribution count
        limit - the maximum contribution count
        Returns:
        the contribution count of the specified user, at maximum the specified limit
        Throws:
        InvalidResponseException - if the API response cannot be parsed
        HttpMediaWikiException - if an HTTP error occurs
        MediaWikiException - if an error occurs during the request
        NullPointerException - if the specified user is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified limit is less than one

      • getContribCount

        int getContribCount(String user,
                  int limit,
                  Set<Namespace> namespaces)
                    throws MediaWikiException
        Returns the contribution count for the specified user in the specified namespaces using the specified limit. If the user does not exist, zero is returned. If the set of namespaces is empty, all namespaces are used.
        Parameters:
        user - the name of the user to get the contribution count
        limit - the maximum contribution count
        namespaces - the namespaces to count
        Returns:
        the contribution count of the specified user, at maximum the specified limit
        Throws:
        InvalidResponseException - if the API response cannot be parsed
        HttpMediaWikiException - if an HTTP error occurs
        MediaWikiException - if an error occurs during the request
        NullPointerException - if the specified user or namespaces are null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified limit is less than one

      • getContribCount

        int getContribCount(String user,
                  int limit,
                  Set<Namespace> namespaces,
                  DateTime endDate)
                    throws MediaWikiException
        Returns the contribution count for the specified user in the specified namespaces until the specified end date using the specified limit. If the user does not exist, zero is returned. If the set of namespaces is empty, all namespaces are used.
        Parameters:
        user - the name of the user to get the contribution count
        limit - the maximum contribution count
        namespaces - the namespaces to count
        endDate - the date until which contributions will be counted
        Returns:
        the contribution count of the specified user, at maximum the specified limit
        Throws:
        InvalidResponseException - if the API response cannot be parsed
        HttpMediaWikiException - if an HTTP error occurs
        MediaWikiException - if an error occurs during the request
        NullPointerException - if the specified user, namespaces or end date are null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified limit is less than one

      • getContribCount

        int getContribCount(String user,
                  int limit,
                  Set<Namespace> namespaces,
                  DateTime endDate,
                  Period period)
                    throws MediaWikiException
        Returns the contribution count for the specified user in the specified namespaces until the specified end date within the specified period using the specified limit. If the user does not exist, zero is returned. If the set of namespaces is empty, all namespaces are used. The specified period is subtracted from the specified end date to calculate the start date.
        Parameters:
        user - the name of the user to get the contribution count
        limit - the maximum contribution count
        namespaces - the namespaces to count
        endDate - the date until which contributions will be counted
        period - the period before the end date in which the contributions will be counted
        Returns:
        the contribution count of the specified user, at maximum the specified limit
        Throws:
        InvalidResponseException - if the API response cannot be parsed
        HttpMediaWikiException - if an HTTP error occurs
        MediaWikiException - if an error occurs during the request
        NullPointerException - if the specified user, namespaces, end date or period are null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified limit is less than one

      • getFirstEdit

        Optional<DateTime> getFirstEdit(String user)
                                throws MediaWikiException
        Returns the date of the first edit for the specified user. If the user does not exist or has not edited yet, an absent object is returned.
        Parameters:
        user - the name of the user to get the first edit for
        Returns:
        the date of the user’s first edit
        Throws:
        InvalidResponseException - if the API response cannot be parsed
        HttpMediaWikiException - if an HTTP error occurs
        MediaWikiException - if an error occurs during the request
        NullPointerException - if the specified user is null

      • getUserData

        UserData getUserData(String user)
                     throws MediaWikiException
        Returns the user date for the user with the given name. The user data consists of the name (as returned by the API), the MediaWiki ID and the registration date.
        Parameters:
        user - the name of the user to get the date for
        Returns:
        the detail data for the specified user
        Throws:
        NoSuchUserException - if there is no user with the specified name
        InvalidResponseException - if the API response cannot be parsed
        HttpMediaWikiException - if an HTTP error occurs
        MediaWikiException - if an error occurs during the request
        NullPointerException - if the specified user is null

      • performJsonRequest

        JSONObject performJsonRequest(String action,
                            Map<String,String> arguments)
                              throws MediaWikiException
        Performs an API request on the specified action using the specified arguments and returns the action result. This method uses the JSON format. (This format cannot be overwritten by the values in the specified arguments.) If the API returns an error, a MediaWikiException is thrown. Otherwise the JSON object with the same name as the specified action is returned (if it exists).
        Parameters:
        action - the name of the action to request
        arguments - the arguments to pass to the API
        Returns:
        the action result in the JSON format
        Throws:
        HttpMediaWikiException - if an HTTP error occurs
        MediaWikiException - if an error occurs during the request
        NullPointerException - if the specified action or arguments map is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified action is empty

      • performRequest

        String performRequest(Map<String,String> arguments)
                      throws MediaWikiException
        Performs an API request using the specified arguments and returns the raw result.
        Parameters:
        arguments - the arguments to pass to the API
        Returns:
        the raw API result
        Throws:
        HttpMediaWikiException - if an HTTP error occurs
        MediaWikiException - if an error occurs during the request
        NullPointerException - if the specified arguments map is null
